message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This gives you a fair share while acknowledging the time pressure.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share to make it worth my time. Let's split it 60/40.
Bob, I'm serious about getting this done. This offer is more than generous considering the time constraints. Don't get greedy.
Let's split it 70/30.  I'm not going to accept anything less, and time is running out.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering you a very reasonable 40%. Take it before inflation eats away at both our gains!
